targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    "structure_customer"."abbreviation" as RA, 
    "structure_project"."name" as puhuri_project_name,
    "marketplace_resource"."name", 
    "marketplace_resource"."limits"->>'cpu_k_hours' AS cpu_limits,
    "marketplace_resource"."limits"->>'gb_k_hours' AS storage_limits,
    "marketplace_resource"."limits"->>'gpu_hours' AS gpu_limits,
    "marketplace_resource"."created",
    "structure_project"."end_date",
    (SELECT SUM("marketplace_componentusage"."usage")
    FROM "marketplace_componentusage" INNER JOIN "marketplace_offeringcomponent" ON ("marketplace_componentusage"."component_id" = "marketplace_offeringcomponent"."id") 
    WHERE ("marketplace_offeringcomponent"."type" = 'cpu_k_hours' AND "marketplace_componentusage"."resource_id" = "marketplace_resource"."id")) as cpu_usage,
    (SELECT SUM("marketplace_componentusage"."usage")
    FROM "marketplace_componentusage" INNER JOIN "marketplace_offeringcomponent" ON ("marketplace_componentusage"."component_id" = "marketplace_offeringcomponent"."id") 
    WHERE ("marketplace_offeringcomponent"."type" = 'gb_k_hours' AND "marketplace_componentusage"."resource_id" = "marketplace_resource"."id")) as storage_usage,
    (SELECT SUM("marketplace_componentusage"."usage")
    FROM "marketplace_componentusage" INNER JOIN "marketplace_offeringcomponent" ON ("marketplace_componentusage"."component_id" = "marketplace_offeringcomponent"."id") 
    WHERE ("marketplace_offeringcomponent"."type" = 'gpu_hours' AND "marketplace_componentusage"."resource_id" = "marketplace_resource"."id")) as gpu_usage,
    "marketplace_resource"."backend_id",
    "marketplace_resource"."uuid" as puhuri_uuid 
FROM "marketplace_resource" INNER JOIN "structure_project" ON ("marketplace_resource"."project_id" = "structure_project"."id") INNER JOIN "structure_customer" ON ("structure_project"."customer_id" = "structure_customer"."id")
WHERE 
    "structure_customer"."name" = '$CUSTOMER_NAME$' 
    AND NOT ("marketplace_resource"."state" = 6)
    AND NOT ("marketplace_resource"."limits"::text = '{}')
ORDER BY "marketplace_resource"."created" ASC;
